title: POOL PARTY TALIYAH!!
body: PLEASE MAKE POOL PARTY TALIYAH!!!! Pool Party Taliyah can do a lot of things. For Q, Taliyah can throw water balloons and can pop and splash off. W can be a surf board bouncing the opponent off of it, and saying "Wipeout!". E can be water balloons placed on the floor and can pop and splash kind of like Q. The ultimate can be a BIG pool that has pool stuff surrounding it. When u use it, u can surf and water can splash all around. For the passive, Taliyah can surf onto the walls of the map, and a small wave can be behind and water splashing on the left and right, like a regular wave. IF u take this concept, please give me the skin for free and Taliyah 2. :D. Please feel free to make concepts!!!

replies.body: This is an awesome idea mind if I draw a concept of it?
so you do mind? or do you want me to

I WANT U 2 BRO OMG
THAT WOULD BE AMAZING
Maybe the W could be this big splash that pushes them.

I brainstormed some ideas for her abilities, (drawing some concept later if your wouldn't mind :D) so the passive would be a boogie board with bubble particles and water gliding under it, her Q would be balloons and her worked ground would be a kiddy pool, her w could be a diving board going up a knocking them in any direction, her e could either be pool noodles or water balloons, and her ult could be a giant water slide.
I think the E should be something like seashells or like little sand castles, because ziggs already throws balloons on the ground

Forgot the Q circle, great thinking tho. I'm gonna draw the splash art by hand. But I don't think I can post it on here tho. Ill try to. I also thought she could ride a wave on the ult and water splashing off from the surf board.
Forgot the Q circle, great thinking tho. I'm gonna draw the splash art by hand. But I don't think I can post it on here tho. Ill try to.
